name: Goblin Rush
description:
Ready your weapon and fight your way through a goblin infested dungeon. Goblin Rush is an action-packed VR experience with level-based gameplay, including several enemy types as well as both ranged and melee fighting.
The game features 10 levels with increasing difficulty. However, the game doesn’t end here; you can keep exploring the dungeons, searching the environment and killing every creature in sight to improve your high score.
